title: Are Your LLM-based Text-to-SQL Models Secure? Exploring SQL Injection via Backdoor Attacks
authors: Meiyu Lin, Haichuan Zhang, Jiale Lao, Renyuan Li, Yuanchun Zhou, Carl Yang, Yang Cao, Mingjie Tang
publish: Proceedings of the ACM on Management of Data
title_zh: 你的基于大语言模型的文本到SQL模型安全吗？通过后门攻击探索SQL注入

title: Generative Feedback for Code Learning: A Study on LLM-Driven Formative Assessment
authors: Liuqiao Chen, Yan Huang, Zhenglin Jiang, Ying Chen
publish: Proceedings of the 2025 International Conference on AI-enabled Education
